Name: Gopnik Simulator
About the game: This is a clicker game in which you play for gopnik. Eat sunflower seeds, talk with friends, drink and increase your skill! Features: - Clicker - Steam achievments - Nice graphic and music - Endless gameplay - Five different currencies - This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5
